name: Obie
headline: Insurance and Risk Management for Landlords
description: Obie is an insurance technology company, hyper-focused on driving value for the modern real estate investor and the partners they work with every day. Whether you are an owner, lender, agent, or property manager, Obie’s mission is to build technology and insurance products that drive efficiency and fundamentally change the way insurance is bought and sold.
markdown:

# Protect yourself and‍your investment. your investment
Instant insurance built for landlords and real estate investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6cc5ff9bcad_search.svg)
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![Check mark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a65f37f9bd16_selected.svg)
More than $25 Billion in property insured with Obie
![Check mark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a65f37f9bd16_selected.svg)
Available in all 50 states
We are more than just an insurance brokerage
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6d2f2f9bcbf_Vector.svg)
Insurance as it should be
Insurance when you need it, without the hassle of paper applications and confusing processes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6d931f9bccc_Vector-1.svg)
Lowest rates
Tech enabled to offer industry-best rates for the plans that are right for you.
## In The Media
Obie has been featured in some of the top insurance, tech, and business blogs around the globe because of its innovative technology and approach to changing how investors and landlords obtain insurance. Getting insurance for rental properties can be a smooth and fast experience. Obie makes this possible.
![Forbes Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61fbfb87557c5916394a73ee_Forbes.svg)
![Crain's Chicago Business Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61fbfb1c4ab8714415ab6888_Craines%202.svg)
![Business Insider Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61fbfa6f92ec62106b77902d_Business_Insider.svg)
![Fortune Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61fbfa519b8f773434ffbff5_Fortune.svg)
![Tech Crunch Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61fbfac2fd74102facfc0e52_TechCrunch%202.svg)
![Yahoo Finance Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61fbfbe1437143b3ea63691d_YahooFinance.svg)
## Why Obie?
Obie is reinventing the insurance process for landlords and rental property investors. Whether you're a seasoned investor or just starting out, Obie makes requesting a quote and getting coverage simple, affordable, and transparent.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6001ff9bd9f_Simple%20Icon.svg)
### Simple
Our simple quote request process will match you with the right insurance for your rental. It couldn't be easier, or faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a68c4df9bda0_Dollar%20Coin.svg)
### Affordable
Get the coverage you need to protect your investment, and save some money for your future investments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6304cf9bda1_Shield.svg)
### Transparent
Our whole process is online and straightforward. Just answer a few property questions and we’ll get you covered.
## Save Time and Money
Obie streamlines landlord insurance, offering instant quotes in all 50 states. Getting a quote and purchasing a policy online is faster than ever before, making it easy to get covered and protect your investment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6bf54f9bcf0_Dot%20Pack2.svg)[Get instant quote](http://www.ObieInsurance.com/<https:/app.obieinsurance.com/quote-requests/new>)
![Landlord Insurance Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/62eb06aab3415ebcd8ad0273_Device%202.svg)![Landlord Insurance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/64de3cec6b610585a3e587a8_Device%201%20New.svg)
## We've Got You Covered
Every rental property is different so we built Obie to be customizable. We’ll make sure that you’re covered and your investment is protected.
![Purple-haired person reducing their risk, surrounded by Obie uFlow, arrows, and graphs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a668f7f9bdcd_Reduce%20Your%20Risk%20v3.svg)
### Reduce Your Risk
Landlord insurance will help protect you from the unexpected.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6b30bf9bd9c_Increase%20Financial%20Security.svg)
### Increase Financial Security
Grow cash flow and asset value by decreasing insurance costs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6e6bdf9bd9d_Gain%20Peace%20of%20Mind.svg)
### Gain Peace of Mind
Relax knowing you and your rental property are covered.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6aa08f9bd93_Single%20Family%20Rental.svg)
### Single Family
One unit, one house.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6501ff9bd94_Duplex.svg)
### Multifamily
Two to four units in a building.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a619e9f9bd97_Apartment%20\(Owned\).svg)
### Apartment
Buildings with 5+ units.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a66679f9bd96_Condo%20%26%20Townhome%20\(Owned\).svg)
### Condo Units
An owned unit within a building.
## Your Rental Property, Covered
Own a condo in Ohio? Renting out a beach house in Florida? We’ve got you.
Your home doesn’t need to be occupied 100% of the time to get coverage. Whether your property is vacant, rented out as a short-term rental (AirBnB), or you’re in the process of renovating or flipping, we can cover you.
Don’t see your rental property here?
Reach out to us
### Already insured?Switching is easy with Obie.
On average, people save 25% with Obie.

## In The Media
Obie has been featured in some of the top insurance, tech, and business blogs around the globe because of its innovative technology and approach to changing how investors and landlords obtain insurance. Getting insurance for rental properties can be a smooth and fast experience. Obie makes this possible.
![Forbes Logo⟨25⟩]
![Crain's Chicago Business Logo⟨26⟩]
![Business Insider Logo⟨27⟩]
![Fortune Logo⟨28⟩]
![Tech Crunch Logo⟨29⟩]
![Yahoo Finance Logo⟨30⟩]
## Why Obie?
Obie is reinventing the insurance process for landlords and rental property investors. Whether you're a seasoned investor or just starting out, Obie makes requesting a quote and getting coverage simple, affordable, and transparent.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6001ff9bd9f_Simple%20Icon.svg)
### Simple
Our simple quote request process will match you with the right insurance for your rental. It couldn't be easier, or faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a68c4df9bda0_Dollar%20Coin.svg)
### Affordable
Get the coverage you need to protect your investment, and save some money for your future investments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6304cf9bda1_Shield.svg)
### Transparent
Our whole process is online and straightforward. Just answer a few property questions and we’ll get you covered.
## Save Time and Money
Obie streamlines landlord insurance, offering instant quotes in all 50 states. Getting a quote and purchasing a policy online is faster than ever before, making it easy to get covered and protect your investment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6bf54f9bcf0_Dot%20Pack2.svg)Get instant quote⟨23⟩
![Landlord Insurance Quote⟨31⟩]![Landlord Insurance⟨32⟩]
## We've Got You Covered
Every rental property is different so we built Obie to be customizable. We’ll make sure that you’re covered and your investment is protected.
![Purple-haired person reducing their risk, surrounded by Obie uFlow, arrows, and graphs⟨33⟩]
### Reduce Your Risk
Landlord insurance will help protect you from the unexpected.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6b30bf9bd9c_Increase%20Financial%20Security.svg)
### Increase Financial Security
Grow cash flow and asset value by decreasing insurance costs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6e6bdf9bd9d_Gain%20Peace%20of%20Mind.svg)
### Gain Peace of Mind
Relax knowing you and your rental property are covered.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6aa08f9bd93_Single%20Family%20Rental.svg)
### Single Family
One unit, one house.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a6501ff9bd94_Duplex.svg)
### Multifamily
Two to four units in a building.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a619e9f9bd97_Apartment%20\(Owned\).svg)
### Apartment
Buildings with 5+ units.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61845d4d9442a6529df9ba48/61845d4d9442a66679f9bd96_Condo%20%26%20Townhome%20\(Owned\).svg)
### Condo Units
An owned unit within a building.
## Your Rental Property, Covered
Own a condo in Ohio? Renting out a beach house in Florida? We’ve got you.
Your home doesn’t need to be occupied 100% of the time to get coverage. Whether your property is vacant, rented out as a short-term rental (AirBnB), or you’re in the process of renovating or flipping, we can cover you.
Don’t see your rental property here?
Reach out to us

generated_description:
**Obie: Reinventing Insurance for Landlords**

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S19, Obie has established itself as a forward-thinking insurance technology company based in Chicago, Illinois. With a dedicated team of 94 employees, Obie aims to redefine how insurance and risk management are approached for landlords and real estate investors.

### Mission and Vision

Obie's primary mission is to provide insurance and risk management solutions tailored to the modern real estate investor. Whether you’re an owner, lender, agent, or property manager, Obie emphasizes driving value through technology and innovative insurance products. They strive to streamline the process of buying and selling insurance, making it simpler, faster, and more efficient.

### Key Offerings

Obie's product suite includes:

1. **Landlord Insurance** - Comprehensive coverage options to protect residential and commercial properties.
2. **PolicyProof** - A tool for verifying insurance coverage across multiple properties, ensuring peace of mind.
3. **Embedded Insurance** - A feature that allows real estate partners to integrate Obie’s insurance offerings into their platforms.

### Target Audience

Obie caters to a diverse clientele:
- **For Agents**: Thousands of agents collaborate with Obie for reliable coverage solutions.
- **For Lenders**: Explore innovative ways to integrate insurance into lending processes.
- **For Property Managers**: Enhance your services while securing the right insurance for property owners.
- **For Real Estate Technology Partners**: Open new revenue streams with Obie's embedded solutions.
- **For Owners and Investors**: Customized coverage options, no matter the size of your portfolio.

### Resources and Support

Obie also provides useful resources, including a blog packed with expert insights, a risk map for assessing vulnerabilities, and a glossary of insurance terms to help educate clients about their options. Their approach is all about transparency and support, ensuring that clients are informed every step of the way.

### Why Choose Obie?

- **Simplicity**: The quote request process is streamlined for speed and ease.
- **Affordability**: Competitive rates designed to maximize savings for landlords and investors alike.
- **Transparency**: An online framework where clients can engage without confusing paperwork or hidden fees.

### Nationwide Impact

Obie's offerings are available in all 50 states, with over $25 billion in property insured since its inception. Their services are engineered to address various needs, whether for a small single-family home or a larger multifamily investment.

The insurance industry is often bogged down by complexity, but Obie is changing that narrative. As they continue to grow and expand their services, Obie exemplifies what modern insurance should look like — straightforward, effective, and ready to adapt to the challenges of today's real estate landscape.

If you're interested in learning more or need assistance, check out their website [ObieInsurance.com](http://www.ObieInsurance.com).
